Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for D3 DFA Metapneumovirus Identification Kit for qualitative immunofluorescent detection of human metapneumovirus antigens in respiratory specimens and cell culture
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and identification of human metapneumovirus (hMPV) in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs and aspirates/washes or cell culture from patients with acute respiratory infection, using immunofluorescence with monoclonal antibodies; does not differentiate hMPV genetic sublineages
